name: MEC Camp Pillow
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Not your basic postage-stamp-sized camping pillow. The MEC Camp Pillow is roomy and comfortable, just like your regular pillow at home. Stuffed with cushy, open-cell foam pieces, it cradles your head so you get a fantastic sleep under the stars. A little luxury goes a long way in the wilderness.Exterior fabric is polyester with a brushed finish that's soft on skin.Filled with squishy open-cell foam pieces.Includes a stuff sack.
